item.title: What Regeneron's Purchase Of 23andMe Means For Your Genetic Privacy
item.description: Your DNA, new owner—what Regeneron's purchase of 23andMe means for your genetic privacy.

item.title: Roger Penske, The Lion In Winter, Reacts After Indy 500 Embarrassment
item.description: Roger Penske, after a cheating scandal this week, fired three leaders of his IndyCar race team. It was another controversy for the Lion in Winter.

item.title: How Tech And Trust Are Encouraging Independence Of Autistic Teenagers
item.description: Across all expert voices, a central message is clear: technology can enable autonomy for teenagers, but it cannot replace community.
